thread.title: CJ

author: CJ
title: CJ
text:
I ordered a service...had trouble utilizing the service and attempted to correct it with the vendor. After several days, the vendor advised there was nothing they could do. Although the three days had expired to have the funds returned by Groupon, I took a chance and contacted them. All I can say is WOW!!! Great Customer support, with excellent listening skills and a touch of empathy, Three days later all of my money was returned.
Thank you Groupon, for taking a moment to care, and securing a Customer for a lifetime!
CJ
